code: import updateAnimeDetails from"./anime-details";import updateAnimeList from"./anime-list";import updateAnimeSearchList from"./anime-search-list";import updateMyList from"./my-list";var reducer=function reducer(state,action){return{animeList:updateAnimeList(state,action),animeDetails:updateAnimeDetails(state,action),animeSearchList:updateAnimeSearchList(state,action),myList:updateMyList(state,action)};};export default reducer;
